item.title: Cork Open Coffee August 19th
item.description: This week’s Cork Open Coffee is on this Friday at The Rubicon at 10:15am (CIT,Bishopstown,Cork). There are no presentations or demos lined up this week, just open networking. Want to talk at Open Coffee? If you would like to give a talk or show off a new product for some feedback at an upcoming Cork Open Coffee, please get in touch by emailing corkopencoffee@gmail.com Talk to you all on Friday Donâ€™t forget to follow @corkopencoffee on Twitter!
